attributes.action: Oppose general election on 02 May. This will cause chaos & elect current rabble
attributes.additional_details: There are many new freedom movements in the UK that are dissatisfied with the current Government and the opposition. Different colour but same rhetoric. In Holland and Argentina we see worldwide dissatisfaction with the WEF & WHO, conflicts Israel and Ukraine, uniting people in an upswell of discontent. English politics is under threat & needs a complete overhaul. New parties are forming around the country and need more time to mount a credible option for the UK public, as per George Galloway.
attributes.background: There is already a petition for an election to be held on 02 May, this petition is in direct opposition. The Rochdale bye-election showed the countries lack of confidence in current mainstream political parties. Numerous minor parties & candidates are rising and need time to mount serious opposition

rejection.details: The Prime Minister has said that there will not be an election on 2 May.
